message: Use the <kbd>←</kbd> and <kbd>→</kbd> arrow keys to switch between theme colours of the timetable and press <kbd>X</kbd> to toggle between light and dark modes!</kbd>
Bookmarking modules can help you access them quickly from the Bookmark icon ( ) in the top navigation bar.
You can quickly navigate between the pages by pressing <kbd>M</kbd> for Module finder, <kbd>T</kbd> for Timetable builder and <kbd>P</kbd> for Preferences.
Pressing <kbd>.</kbd> highlights the timetable page's search bar so that you can add modules to your timetable quickly.
Pressing <kbd>/</kbd> highlights the search bar at the top so that you can search for modules easily.

On a module's page, you can quickly navigate between the various sections using keyboard shortcuts! Press <kbd>E</kbd> to jump to the prerequisities section, <kbd>R</kbd> to jump to the reviews section, <kbd>C</kbd> to jump to the CORS bidding history section and <kbd>S</kbd> to jump to the lesson schedule section.
NUSMods supports many keyboard shortcuts to make usage super easy. Check them out here. Press ? and see what happens!
